price: Dhagayaa! Dhugumatti isaan isaanumatu warra badiiti. Garuu [haala gadhee isaanii kana] hin beekanu.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alā innahum humu al-muf'sidūna walākin lā yashʿurūna
